survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Finance Tool User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered personal finance tools to improve features, usability, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance tool?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in your AI-powered personal finance tool? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes for this question to allow multiple selections.
